name: CrestronforSmartHomeandConferenceRoom
0:
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen lights”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Crestron's Alexa Skill 

Our new and improved skill provides two different sets of functionality: 
 - Smart Home
 - Conference Room

** Smart Home Capabilities **

An Alexa enabled Crestron Home Automation system allows you to do more than just control lights and thermostats. It allows you to talk to your house. Use the full range of Amazon SmartHome commands to control your Crestron system.

Some example requests:
"Alexa, turn on the kitchen lights"
"Alexa, brighten the living room lights"
"Alexa, set the basement thermostat to 70 degrees"

For more help with controlling your Crestron system with Alexa, go to http://partners.crestron.com/alexa/faq

Talk to your integrator to enable your Crestron 3-Series processor for Alexa control.

** Conference Room Capabilities **

With Crestron's Alexa skill, you can now interact with your conference room by voice. Use voice commands such as “Alexa, start my meeting”, to automatically connect to the scheduled meeting in the conference room or start an adhoc meeting.

Get started by enabling the Alexa skill in your Alexa for Business account, linking your Crestron account, and adding the skill to the rooms you created in your Alexa for Business account.

For more information, please visit the Crestron FAQ at http://partners.crestron.com/alexa/faq

Talk to your integrator to enable your Crestron 3-Series processor for Alexa control.
